mdRecord.dcterms:title: Law School Class of 1929 in 1964
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R. [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Law School alumni. Standing, left to right: [unidentified], L. Mercer Smith, Shirley M. Helm, Lewis D. Mowry, Jr., Roy W. Wheeler, Thomas A. McEachern, Joseph Wilton Hope, Jr., [unindentified], Horace A. Teass and [unidentified]. Seated, left to right: [unidentified, first through fifth from left], Frank L. Taylor, Homer W. Lynch, Richard N. Crockett and Willis W. Bohannon. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
